name: Cylinder Tracking
query:
SELECT
  rb.roast_cylinder                                               AS "Cylinder:Link/Roast Cylinder:140",
  COALESCE(rb.customer, '')                                       AS "Customer:Data:160",
  rb.roast_date                                                   AS "Date:Date:105",

  /* GREEN */
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=1 THEN COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G1 (green):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=2 THEN COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G2 (green):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=3 THEN COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G3 (green):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)), 2)                                           AS "Sum (green):Float:95",

  /* ROASTED */
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=1 THEN COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G1 (roasted):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=2 THEN COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G2 (roasted):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=3 THEN COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G3 (roasted):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)), 2)                                          AS "Sum (roasted):Float:105",

  /* LOSS (green - roasted) */
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=1 THEN (COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G1 (loss):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=2 THEN (COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G2 (loss):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.round_no=3 THEN (COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G3 (loss):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)), 2)                                           AS "Sum (loss):Float:95",

  /* Rejects & Net */
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.quacker,0)), 2)                                                                      AS "Quacker (kg):Float:85",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.quacker,0)), 2)                                           AS "Net Coffee (kg):Float:110",

  rb.name AS "Batch ID:Link/Roast Batch:130",
  rb.roasting_machine AS "Machine:Link/Roasting Machine:150",
  rb.operator AS "Operator:Link/User:130"

FROM `tabRoast Batch` rb
LEFT JOIN `tabRoast Batch Round` rbr ON rbr.parent = rb.name
WHERE 1=1
  AND ( %(roast_cylinder)s = '' OR rb.roast_cylinder   = %(roast_cylinder)s )
  AND ( %(from_date)s       = '' OR rb.roast_date      >= %(from_date)s )
  AND ( %(to_date)s         = '' OR rb.roast_date      <= %(to_date)s )
  AND ( %(roasting_machine)s= '' OR rb.roasting_machine= %(roasting_machine)s )
  AND ( %(operator)s        = '' OR rb.operator        = %(operator)s )
GROUP BY rb.name, rb.roast_cylinder, rb.customer, rb.roast_date
ORDER BY rb.roast_date, rb.name;
